name: React
tooltip: 6 years experience Â· Used in 20+ projects
description: React is a component-based JavaScript library developed by Facebook. It revolutionizes frontend development by allowing developers to build reusable, declarative UI components that update efficiently in response to data changes using a virtual DOM.

name: Redux
description: Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript applications. It centralizes application state in a single store and uses pure reducer functions, enabling consistent behavior across environments and easy debugging.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is the programming language of the web. It enables dynamic behavior, asynchronous operations, and interaction with the DOM, making websites engaging and interactive.

name: CSS
description: CSS styles the visual presentation of web pages. It allows layout design, transitions, animations, and responsive behavior to deliver pixel-perfect UI experiences across devices.

name: Framer Motion
description: Framer Motion is a production-ready motion library for React. It provides powerful declarative animation APIs for transitions, gestures, layout animations, and drag-and-drop features.
